title: The maintenance of the ministery VVherein is plainely declared how the ministers of the Gospell ought to be maintayned: and the true and ancient practise of our Church in this case, shewed to be agreeable to the word of God, and all antiquity. Necessary in these times to be read and considered of all sorts of Christians, but specially of such as liue in townes and citties. By Richard Eburne, minister of the word.
author: Eburne, Richard.
publisher: Printed [by Thomas Creede] for Eleazar Edgar, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Wind-Mill,
